dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your coaching journey

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
intro.heading: Secure Your Account with Two-Factor Authentication

step1.title: Download an authenticator app
step1.description: Install Google Authenticator, Authy, or another TOTP app on your phone

step2.title: Scan the QR code
step2.description: Use your authenticator app to scan the QR code we'll show you

step3.title: Enter verification code
step3.description: Confirm setup by entering a code from your authenticator app

intro.warning: Make sure to save your backup codes in a secure location. You'll need them if you lose access to your authenticator app.

qrCode.title: QR Code
qrCode.description: Scan this code with your authenticator app
qrCode.heading: Scan with Authenticator App
qrCode.instruction: Open your authenticator app and scan this QR code
qrCode.appSuggestion: We recommend Google Authenticator, Authy, or Microsoft Authenticator

manualKey.title: Manual Setup
manualKey.description: Enter this key manually in your authenticator app
manualKey.heading: Manual Setup Key
manualKey.instruction: Enter this key manually in your authenticator app
manualKey.warning: Keep this secret key secure. Anyone with access to it can generate codes for your account.

verify.title: Verify Setup
verify.description: Enter a code from your authenticator app to complete setup
verify.heading: Verify Your Setup
verify.instruction: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
verify.help: The code changes every 30 seconds, so make sure to use the current one

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.description: Save these codes to recover your account if needed
backupCodes.heading: Save Your Backup Codes
backupCodes.instruction: Store these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your phone.
backupCodes.warning: Each backup code can only be used once. Store them securely and don't share them with anyone.

complete.title: Setup Complete
complete.description: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled
complete.heading: Setup Complete!
complete.instruction: Two-factor authentication is now active on your account. You'll need to enter codes from your authenticator app when signing in.
complete.feature1: Your account is now more secure
complete.feature2: You have backup codes for emergencies
complete.feature3: You can manage MFA settings anytime

challenge.title: Two-Factor Authentication
challenge.description: Enter the code from your authenticator app to continue
challenge.backupDescription: Enter one of your backup codes to continue
challenge.backupHelp: Enter one of your 8-digit backup codes
challenge.trustDeviceDescription: Don't ask for codes on this device for 30 days
challenge.totpHelp: Open your authenticator app and enter the 6-digit code
challenge.backupCodeHelp: Each backup code can only be used once

troubleshoot.title: Having trouble?
troubleshoot.tip1: Make sure your device's time is correct
troubleshoot.tip3: Use a backup code if available

verification.label: Verification Code
verification.help: Enter the code from your authenticator app

qrCode.instruction: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
qrCode.apps: Works with Google Authenticator, Authy, and more

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.downloadSubtitle: Save these codes in a secure location
backupCodes.downloadInstructions: Use these codes to access your account if you lose your authenticator device. Each code can only be used once.
backupCodes.downloadWarning: Keep these codes secret and secure. Anyone with access to them can access your account.
backupCodes.instruction: Use these codes to access your account if you lose your authenticator device
backupCodes.rule1: Each code can only be used once
backupCodes.rule2: Store them in a secure location
backupCodes.lowWarning: You only have {count} backup codes remaining. Consider regenerating new ones.
backupCodes.usedInfo: You have used {used} of {total} backup codes.
backupCodes.securityWarning: Keep these codes secret and secure. Anyone with access to them can bypass two-factor authentication on your account.

management.title: Two-Factor Authentication
management.description: Manage your account's two-factor authentication settings
management.recommendedAlert: We strongly recommend enabling two-factor authentication to secure your account.
management.enabledAlert: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication.

status.enabledDescription: Your account is protected with an additional security layer
status.disabledDescription: Enable MFA for enhanced account security

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.description: Emergency codes to access your account

hidden.title: Backup codes are hidden
hidden.description: Click to view your backup codes

trustedDevices.title: Trusted Devices
trustedDevices.description: Devices that don't require MFA codes

securityEvents.title: Security Activity
securityEvents.description: Recent security events on your account

recovery.title: Recovery Options
recovery.warning: Make sure to update your stored backup codes if you regenerate them.

signin.title: Sign In
signin.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.description: Create your account to get started

verify.title: Two-Factor Authentication
verify.description: Enter the code from your authenticator app to continue

setup.title: Set Up Two-Factor Authentication
setup.description: Secure your account with an extra layer of protection
setup.required: Multi-factor authentication is required for your account
setup.adminRequired: Multi-factor authentication is required for admin accounts
setup.scanInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
setup.compatibleApps: Compatible with Google Authenticator, Authy, Microsoft Authenticator, and more
setup.verificationInstructions: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup
setup.verifyDescription: Enter the code from your authenticator app to verify setup
setup.error: Failed to set up MFA. Please try again.

mfa.authenticatorInstructions: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.backupCodeInstructions: Enter one of your 8-character backup codes
mfa.rememberDeviceWarning: Only select this on trusted devices
mfa.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
mfa.accountLocked: Account temporarily locked due to failed attempts
mfa.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please check your code and try again.

backup.description: Save these backup codes in a secure location
backup.importance: Important: Save these backup codes now. They're your only way to recover your account if you lose access to your authenticator app.

instructions.1: Each code can only be used once
instructions.2: Store them in a safe place (password manager, secure note)

complete.title: MFA Setup Complete!
complete.description: Your account is now protected with multi-factor authentication

auth.welcomeDescription: Sign in to your coaching platform account
auth.joinUsDescription: Create your account and start your coaching journey
auth.checkYourEmail: Check your email for a verification link
auth.passwordResetSent: Password reset instructions sent to your email
auth.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists
auth.weakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.resetEmailSentDescription: We've sent you a password reset link. Please check your email and click the link to continue.
auth.setNewPasswordDescription: Enter your new password below to complete the reset process.
auth.passwordUpdatedDescription: Your password has been updated successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link

session.title: Title
session.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this session?
session.manageSessionsDescription: View and manage all your coaching sessions
session.viewAndBookSessions: View and book coaching sessions with your coaches
session.selectCoachAndTime: Select a coach and available time slot
session.selectCoachAndTimeSlot: Choose your preferred coach and an available time slot for your session

clients.title: Client Management
clients.description: Manage your coaching clients and track their progress

insights.title: Coach Insights
insights.description: Analytics and performance metrics for your coaching practice

client.howDoYouFeel: How do you feel after this session?
client.whatDidYouLearn: What did you learn or realize?
client.nextSessionGoals: What would you like to focus on next session?

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validationError: Please check the form for errors.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
errors.maintenanceMode: The system is currently under maintenance.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {max} characters
validation.passwordStrength: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number
